movie.name: Army of The Dead
movie.desc: Following a zombie outbreak in Las Vegas, a group of mercenaries take the ultimate gamble, venturing into the quarantine zone to pull off the greatest heist ever attempted.

movie.name: Olympus Has Fallen
movie.desc: Secret Service agent Mike Banning finds himself trapped inside the White House in the wake of a terrorist attack and works with national security to rescue the President from his kidnappers.

movie.name: London Has Fallen
movie.desc: In London for the Prime Minister's funeral, Mike Banning is caught up in a plot to assassinate all the attending world leaders.

movie.name: Ghost Lab
movie.desc: After witnessing a haunting in their hospital, two doctors become dangerously obsessed with obtaining scientific proof that ghosts exist.

movie.name: Mile 22
movie.desc: A small team of elite American intelligence officers, part of a top-secret tactical command unit, try to smuggle a mysterious police officer with sensitive information out of Indonesia.

movie.name: The Woman in The Window
movie.desc: An agoraphobic woman living alone in New York begins spying on her new neighbors, only to witness a disturbing act of violence.

movie.name: From London to Bali
movie.desc: For Lukman (Ricky Harun), Dewi's (Jessica Milla) departure to London is a small apocalypse. He works odd jobs in order to catch up to London.

movie.name: Sniper: Ghost Shooter
movie.desc: Snipers ordered to protect a gas pipeline from terrorists suspect a security breach when they're targeted by a ghost shooter who knows their location.

movie.name: The Next Three Days
movie.desc: A married couple's life is turned upside down when the wife is accused of a murder.

movie.name: Final Destination
movie.desc: Alex Browning is among a group of high school students readying themselves for a trip to Europe. When he suddenly has a premonition their airplane will crash, he screams to warn the others but instead he is thrown off of the plane.
